body.serializedContentState: {"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7n821","text":"Technically not my dog but hopefully a buddy of my dog soon...very excited for Winston to join my local police force as a community comfort dog.  Would love nothing more than to see more municipalities do this and very grateful to have him.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"65sg","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":107,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c3qao","text":"https://www.msn.com/en-us/pets-and-animals/dogs/meet-winston-a-chicago-suburb-s-new-comfort-pup/vi-AA1IIyfb","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"url":"https://www.msn.com/en-us/pets-and-animals/dogs/meet-winston-a-chicago-suburb-s-new-comfort-pup/vi-AA1IIyfb"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"LINK"}}}

","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"17rjk","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":24,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"7is8e","text":"Now, its time to press pawsjust for a bit.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1cqt8","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":7,"offset":36,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"f6e1n","text":"Sticker sales will be on hold until October so Marc and I can rest our hands from preparing envelope after envelope. Orders received form closure will be completed. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ei1to","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8cq63","text":"Thank you for sticking with usliterally and figuratively.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"648uu","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"66q8","text":"See you in the fall! 🍂","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}

group.description: Welcome to a community of dog lovers at Microsoft!!

body.serializedContentState: {"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":69,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"79gd2","text":"Buckle up, here comes the biggest announcement from Dogs @ Microsoft ever!","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"tcc7","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":48,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"3ro47","text":"Dogs @ Microsoft x Microsoft 50th Sticker Design","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":51,"offset":429,"style":"ITALIC"}],"key":"c71lk","text":"As if you werent aware already, Microsoft celebrated its 50th anniversary earlier this year. Were looking for your help to inspire the design of a special sticker for GIVE month (October 2025) to commemorate the occasion. Use whatever tools you desire  Microsoft Paint, Copilot, watercolor paint, there are no limitations as your inspiration will not be lifted and printed, it will be used as inspiration for a final design. Check the comments of this thread for more details.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ftvum","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":51,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"4l5qs","text":"Bark at the Park  Mariners vs Padres  August 25th","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":70,"offset":75,"style":"ITALIC"}],"key":"80hl","text":"Are you local to Seattle and have yet to take your dog to a Mariners game? Check out the comment from Si Daniels on this thread for more details.  ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7fj2u","text":" ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":34,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"bmq6n","text":"Quarterly Sticker Revenue Donation","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":22,"offset":438},{"key":1,"length":31,"offset":465}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1qunc","text":"Since reopening the sticker order form in March this community has generated $1613 to be donated and matched by Microsoft, which if youre doing the math at home right now thats over $3200. Going forward, our quarterly donations will align with Microsofts FY quarters. The current total + Junes addition will close out our FY25 donations and we will start fresh in FY26. Noting that our first collective donation will be split between Summit Assistance Dogs and Morris International Foundation.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f1cup","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"length":18,"offset":74}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":89,"offset":168,"style":"ITALIC"}],"key":"5ddqg","text":"Thanks so much for reading, with less than 300 members to go in attaining 5K members in FY25 were looking forward to keeping momentum going into the next fiscal year. Check out Ninas message on this thread for a few ideas to support growing the community.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6qg2s","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2lkql","text":"See you next year! 🐕","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"url":"https://summitdogs.org/"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"LINK"},"1":{"data":{"url":"https://www.morrisanimalfoundation.org/"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"LINK"},"2":{"data":{"url":"https://engage.cloud.microsoft/main/org/microsoft.com/threads/eyJfdHlwZSI6IlRocmVhZCIsImlkIjoiMzE4NDY0MjE4NDIwMDE5MiJ9?trk_copy_link=V2"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"LINK"}}}
